posts.post_title: FS Johnson pitch, Matty dark cap, Lajoie port 1.5-2s & Baker/Chase Tolstois
posts.post_content:
Free shipping...no fee method please

Johnson pitching PSA 1.5 mk (mk due to an awesome back stamp) - ebay auction (seller id vettejayk123)
Mathewson dark cap SGC 1.5 - SOLD
Lajoie portrait SGC 30 - $500
Lajoie throwing overprint back BVG 3 - $400

Chase with trophy TOLSTOI SGC 50 (super sharp with wet sheet transfer and name at top) - SOLD
Baker TOLSTOI SGC 35 - $400
